title: Photo-filter
text: Yo–≥ can upload photo, edit with switches, and download the edited image. Also in the project there are several photos that you can view, edit and download. Loading the collection depends on the time of day.

title: Virtual Piano
text: You can play on mini piano on your keyboard or mouse click
